entry.RedBlue: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.
entry.Yellow: Brutally vicious and enormously destructive. Known for totally destroying cities in ancient times.
entry.Gold: They say that during past wars, GYARADOS would appear and leave blazing ruins in its wake.
entry.Silver: Once it appears, it goes on a rampage. It remains enraged until it demolishes everything around it.
entry.Crystal: It appears whenever there is world conflict, burning down any place it travels through.
entry.Ruby: When MAGIKARP evolves into GYARADOS, its brain cells undergo a structural transformation. It is said that this transformation is to blame for this POKéMON’s wildly violent nature.
entry.Sapphire: Once GYARADOS goes on a rampage, its ferociously violent blood doesn’t calm until it has burned everything down. There are records of this POKéMON’s rampages lasting a whole month.
entry.FireRed: It has an extremely aggressive nature. The HYPER BEAM it shoots from its mouth totally incinerates all targets.
entry.LeafGreen: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.
entry.Emerald: It is an extremely vicious and violent POKéMON. When humans begin to fight, it will appear and burn everything to the ground with intensely hot flames.
entry.Diamond: Once it appears, its rage never settles until it has razed the fields and mountains around it.
entry.Pearl: In ancient literature, there is a record of a GYARADOS that razed a village when violence flared.
entry.Platinum: Once it begins to rampage, a GYARADOS will burn everything down, even in a harsh storm.
entry.HeartGold: They say that during past strife, GYARADOS would appear and leave blazing ruins in its wake.
entry.SoulSilver: Once it appears, it goes on a rampage. It remains enraged until it demolishes everything around it.
entry.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: Once it begins to rampage, a Gyarados will burn everything down, even in a harsh storm.
entry.X: In ancient literature, there is a record of a Gyarados that razed a village when violence flared.
entry.Y: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.
entry.Omega Ruby: When Magikarp evolves into Gyarados, its brain cells undergo a structural transformation. It is said that this transformation is to blame for this Pokémon’s wildly violent nature.
entry.Alpha Sapphire: Once Gyarados goes on a rampage, its ferociously violent blood doesn’t calm until it has burned everything down. There are records of this Pokémon’s rampages lasting a whole month.
entry.Sun: A tale is told of a town that angered Gyarados. Before the sun rose the next day, flames utterly consumed the town, leaving not a trace behind.
entry.Moon: There are people who swear that any place Gyarados appears is fated for destruction.
